Footer.Description: World-class airport limousine service for discerning clients who demand excellence and luxury.
Footer.NewsletterDes: Subscribe to receive special offers and updates.
Footer.Copyright: © Copyright 2025. All rights reserved by LIMOSPRO™

home.title: Premium Chauffeur Service
home.description: Professional drivers. High-end vehicles. Unparalleled luxury travel experience for discerning clients.

overview.title: Services
overview.description: Discover our range of premium chauffeur services designed to meet your transportation needs.

cards.title: Airport Transfers
cards.alt: A man enjoying a comfortable airport transfer service in the backseat of a premium chauffeur-driven car.
cards.description: Reliable and comfortable transportation to and from airports.

cards.title: Hourly Hire
cards.alt: A client using an hourly hire chauffeur service, with the driver opening the car door for her.
cards.description: Flexible chauffeur service for your day-to-day needs.

cards.title: City-to-City
cards.alt: Passengers arriving comfortably at their destination after a city-to-city trip in a chauffeured vehicle.
cards.description: Comfortable intercity travel with professional chauffeurs.

whyChoose.description: Discover our range of premium chauffeur services designed to provide exceptional comfort and convenience.

cards.title: Safety & Privacy
cards.description: Your safety and privacy are our top priorities. We follow strict protocols and safeguard your personal information to ensure a secure, worry-free travel experience.

cards.title: Flexible Booking
cards.description: Plans change — and that’s okay. Our flexible booking options make it easy to reschedule or adjust your ride without stress.

cards.title: Customer Service
cards.description: Friendly, responsive, and available when you need us — our team is here to make every step of your journey smooth and stress-free.

cards.title: Extensive Services
cards.description: From airport transfers to group travel and corporate rides, we offer a wide range of services to meet every transportation need.

CityRoutes.description1: Enjoy seamless, comfortable travel between cities with our premium City-to-City ride service.
CityRoutes.description2: Whether for business or leisure, our professional chauffeurs ensure a smooth, stress-free journey in high-end vehicles.

citycards.title: New York
citycards.alt: A picture of New York infrastructure

citycards.title: London
citycards.alt: A picture of Tower bridge of London

cards.title: Safety first
cards.description: Travel with peace of mind knowing your safety is our top priority. We adhere to the highest standards of vehicle hygiene, driver training, and health protocols to ensure a safe and comfortable experience every time you ride with us.

cards.title: Tailored Travel Solutions
cards.description: Whether you’re booking a quick airport transfer or a day-long business trip, we offer personalized services to meet your unique travel needs. From hourly bookings to city-to-city rides, we make sure you always get the service that fits your schedule.

cards.title: Eco-Friendly Travel
cards.description: As part of our commitment to sustainability, we offset the carbon emissions of every ride you take. Travel knowing that you are contributing to a greener planet with each journey, thanks to our carbon offset program — a first in the industry.

CorporateGroundTransportation.alt: A picture showing giving me a view of the steering wheel of the car.
CorporateGroundTransportation.description: From executive airport transfers to group event shuttles, we provide tailored ground transportation services designed to meet the demands of modern business travel. Count on punctual service, professional chauffeurs, and seamless coordination every step of the way.

MeetingsAndSpecialEvents.alt: A Picture of a Business Man on the backseat of his car using his computer.
MeetingsAndSpecialEvents.description: Make every meeting and event effortless with our executive travel services. We offer reliable, coordinated transportation for conferences, business gatherings, and special occasions — all with the professionalism and comfort your team deserves.

BookARide.title: Have a route in mind?
BookARide.description: Enter your pickup and drop-off locations to see the price.

DownloadOptions.Heading: Download the app
DownloadOptions.Description1: Easily book, change, or cancel rides on the go. Think of it
DownloadOptions.Description2: as peace of mind in the palm of your hand.

cards.title: Prompt Pickups
cards.description: Always on time for your pick-Up, 60 minutes free of charge wait time for international flights, 30 minutes for domestic, and 15 minutes for others.

cards.title: All-Inclusive Rates
cards.description: All inclusive- price professional car service in Houston with no hidden charges, pay what you see.

cards.title: Private Rides
cards.description: Private Travel Solutions In Houston one-way, round trip airport transfer, point to point, by the hour, long-distance rides city to city based on your time.

PremiumFleet.Description1: Find the perfect vehicle for your trip — from luxury sedans to spacious SUVs and
PremiumFleet.Description2: executive vans. Every ride offers comfort, style, and professional service.

FAQ.Heading: The Most Asked Questions
FAQ.Question: What does an airport transfer do?
FAQ.Answer: An airport transfer is a private car service which takes air passengers to and from the airport from a city or transport hub. Professional airport transfer services like Blacklane offer chauffeur-driven vehicles to pick up passengers in the terminal after they collect their luggage, or drop them off to their departure gate well ahead of time. As a global company Blacklane is ideally suited to airport transfers, as they can handle passenger’s needs at both ends of their international flight.

BookARideHouston.description: Travel in comfort and style with our premium airport pick-up and drop-off options. Book now!

ContactHeroSection.Heading2: Reliable Travel Is One Step Away.

cards.title: Our Locations
cards.description: '8222 Kingsbrook Rd , Houston, TX 77024' and '17103 Imperial Valley Dr, Houston, TX 77060'

cards.title: Email Us
cards.description: info@qalbit.com

cards.title: Visit Now
cards.description: qalbit.com

OurStoryAbout.Description1: AAdmirals Travel & Transportation established in 2013 as a sole proprietorship to provide private airport transfer, limousine, and other ground transportation services in the Houston and Galveston greater areas. After rapid growth in customers, sales, and affiliate networks worldwide, the founder transitioned the business into a corporate entity. New model vehicles were added to accommodate any number of passengers, skilled professional chauffeurs were hired, and clear operational procedures were established to ensure exceptional service quality for all AAdmirals customers.
OurStoryAbout.Description2: Today, we are among the top 5 ground transportation service providers in the Houston and Galveston, TX metropolitan areas.
OurStoryAbout.Description3: We’re proud to see our customer base growing daily — a testament to the trust and satisfaction of those we serve. Our story continues as we keep driving excellence and connection across our community.

OurOfferingsAbout.Heading2: Experience premium limousine and transportation services crafted for comfort, style, and reliability.

cards.title: Our Vision
cards.description: Our vision is to become the foremost ground transportation company in Texas and Louisiana

cards.title: Our Mission
cards.description: Our mission is to provide ground transportation services to corporates and individualizes in high quality levels with fair prices through key strategic partnerships with corporations and reaching out the individualizes

OurValuesAbout.Description: Integrity, transparency, safety, time respect, and perfect customer service will always keep us in demand.

Tabs.question: Your Safety
Tabs.answer: Your safety is our first priority...

Tabs.question: Competitive Prices
Tabs.answer: We offer high-quality services at fair prices.

Tabs.question: Easy to Book
Tabs.answer: Booking with us is simple and quick.

Tabs.question: Online Booking
Tabs.answer: Book from anywhere, anytime with ease.

OurPeers.Description: At AAdmirals Travel, we go beyond basic transportation. From easy online booking and real-time tracking to professional chauffeurs and a well-maintained fleet, every detail is designed to give you a seamless, stress-free experience. Discover what sets us apart.
OurPeers.Feature3: Private Ride & based on Your Time schedule

HeroSectionBC.Heading2: Preferred by Diplomats. Ready for You.

DedicatedServiceSection.P1: By-the-hour personal black car service for events
DedicatedServiceSection.P2: Booking a personal Blacklane for an event? Our
DedicatedServiceSection.P3: gives you the ultimate flexibility and peace of mind. Learn more about how Blacklane’s service is a great fit for attending

cards.title: Corporate conferences and trade shows
cards.alt: Picture of a Business woman sitting in the car using her computer
cards.description: Discover our premium event chauffeur service for punctual arrivals, seamless departures, and peaceful journeys.

cards.title: Leadership offsites and incentive travel
cards.alt: Picture of a Business woman sitting in the car using her computer
cards.description: Trust our corporate chauffeur car service to provide reliable, comfortable journeys that optimize productivity.

cards.title: Hospitality and sponsorship events
cards.alt: Picture of a Business woman sitting in the car using her computer
cards.description: Effortlessly attend sporting events, festivals, and concerts with our limo transportation service.

cards.title: Dedicated events team
cards.description: Our experienced team is ready to help you plan for any event, big or small, global or local, personalized or standardized.

cards.title: Tailored logistics proposals
cards.description: We work closely with you to understand your goals and provide proposals that are tailored to fit your unique needs.

cards.title: Chauffeur excellence
cards.description: To ensure smooth operations, all chauffeurs are of the highest quality and thoroughly briefed before every event.

cards.title: 24/7 event support
cards.description: Our multi-lingual Customer Care and Events Support teams provide round the clock support by phone or email.

cards.title: Personalization and coordination
cards.description: Add a special touch to events with in-car branding and welcome packs. Upon request, we also offer onsite coordination.

cards.title: Global availability
cards.description: Limospro operates in over 50 countries around the world, including top event cities such as NYC, London, and Dubai.

WhoWeSupport.alt: Picture of a Business woman sitting in the car using her computer
description: Corporate Travel teams (EAs and travel managers)

Limospro’s award-winning global chauffeur service provides consistent excellence on every journey. Our modern fleet includes a range of premium vehicles that include top-tier amenities, such as umbrellas for rainy days, complimentary water, refreshments, charging cables and Wi-Fi.

Chauffeurs are vetted, insured, and often undergo additional training to ensure reliable and safe travel. Additionally, our multi-lingual customer support teams are available 24/7 to provide assistance if any issues arise. Rest assured that our premium event chauffeur service will elevate every event experience and meet your unique needs.

ContactForService.Heading: Where Comfort Meets Corporate Class
ContactForService.Description: Experience executive travel designed for performance, professionalism, and peace of mind.

ChaufferHeroSection.Heading: Grow your business with Limospro
ChaufferHeroSection.Description: Limospro’s app and web portal connect licensed and insured chauffeur partners with a global client base of sophisticated business and leisure travelers.

ChaufferTestimony.Heading: Limospro is 60% of my revenue. I’ve grown from 2 to 20 chauffeurs and have 10 vehicles from working with them.

cards1.title: Reliable payments
cards1.description: The amount shown with each offer is the minimum that will be transferred to your account — we deduct no further fees or taxes. Monthly payments for your completed rides will be deposited directly to your bank account.

cards1.title: Complete schedule control
cards1.description: Select your rides through our reverse auction. Shape your own schedule and simply take the rides that best fit your timeline, location, and vehicle type. We offer A-to-B transfers, hourly bookings, City to City rides, and more!

cards1.title: Join an international crew
cards1.description: As a member of the Blacklane crew, you'll be able to say you're a part of an international service, since we arrange rides for our partners and their guests in over 50 countries.

cards2.title: Superior account management
cards2.description: Whether you’re a dispatcher assigning rides to your crew or an owner/operator on the go with some spare time, our app and online Partner Portal are designed to make your life easier. Easily manage all your rides with a few taps or clicks.

cards2.title: Dedicated support team
cards2.description: Alongside our 24/7 Customer Care who help with ongoing/upcoming rides, our Partner Support Team can assist 24/5 for admin issues via chat and email. Plus, FAQs are at your fingertips in our Partner Help Center.

ChaufferRequirements.alt: Picture of a Business-woman using her computer in the backseat of the car
description: Valid company registration plus licenses and insurance for all chauffeurs and vehicles.
Vehicles must be clean, undamaged, smoke-free, and in full compliance with local regulations.
Companies must keep up-to-date with new standards and policies and ensure excellent quality.
ChaufferRequirements.info: Specifics vary, so please check the complete list for your location here:

ChaufferOnboarding.alt: Picture of a Business-woman using her computer in the backseat of the car
description: 2. Upload your documentation for our team to review
3. Complete the training modules and have a short interview with us

ChaufferEnvironmentFriendly.alt: Picture of a Business-woman using her computer in the backseat of the car
description: We’re committed to reducing our environmental impact, which is why we are moving toward making all of our rides electric. Our acquisition of London-based, all-electric chauffeur service Haven’t has been one of our first major steps, as well as incorporating more electric vehicles into our fleets globally. Plus, every ride since 2017 is carbon offset and we’re working on offsetting all of our carbon emissions since the company’s founding in 2011.

ChaufferContactUs.Heading: Have Questions? Contact Us Today!
ChaufferContactUs.Description: Our team is ready to assist you with bookings, services, or any inquiries—reach out and get the support you need.

FAQData.question: Can anyone become a Limospro partners?
FAQData.answer: We only partner with insured, pre-existing chauffeur companies. To apply, you must:  1).Meet our vehicle requirements.  2).Submit documentation for your business, one vehicle, and either yourself or one of your company's chauffeurs   3).Once your account is active, you can add as many vehicles and chauffeurs as you wish.  4).You can check the vehicle and document requirements for your city and begin your partner application here.

FAQData.question: How many rides can I do with Limospro per month?
FAQData.answer: We only partner with insured, pre-existing chauffeur companies. To apply, you must:  1).Meet our vehicle requirements.  2).Submit documentation for your business, one vehicle, and either yourself or one of your company's chauffeurs   3).Once your account is active, you can add as many vehicles and chauffeurs as you wish.  4).You can check the vehicle and document requirements for your city and begin your partner application here.

ContactUsTC.Heading: Have Questions? Contact Us Today!
ContactUsTC.Description: Our team is ready to assist you with bookings, services, or any inquiries—reach out and get the support you need.

q1.question: What is meant by a one-way trip?
q1.answer: It is a one-time trip – pick-up from point A and drop-off at point B.

q2.question: What is meant by a round trip?
q2.answer: A round trip includes pick-up, travel to the destination, and return to the original location.

q3.question: What is meant by a return trip?
q3.answer: A return trip is booked separately for the return journey.

q4.question: Do you offer airport pick-up and drop-off services?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer airport pick-up and drop-off services for all major airports.

q5.question: What information do you need to know when I want to book a car?
q5.answer: We need your pick-up location, drop-off location, date, time, number of passengers, and contact information.

q6.question: Why do you need to know where I am going?
q6.answer: This helps us calculate pricing accurately, assign the right vehicle, and plan the best route.

q7.question: Is there a shuttle from Houston to Galveston?
q7.answer: Yes, shuttle services are available between Houston and Galveston.

q8.question: How much is a shuttle from Houston to Galveston?
q8.answer: The cost depends on the vehicle type, travel time, and number of passengers.

q9.question: Is AAdmirals available for special events and corporate transportation?
q9.answer: Yes, we provide transportation services for special events and corporate travel.

q10.question: What credit cards can I use for your online booking and payment system?
q10.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and Discover.

q11.question: I am out of the United States, how can I book your service?
q11.answer: You can book online through our website or contact our support team for assistance.

q12.question: Can you supply balloons, party hats, ribbons, etc. for the car exterior?
q12.answer: Yes, decorative services can be arranged upon request for an additional charge.

q13.question: Do you service hotels in The Woodlands?
q13.answer: Yes, we provide transportation services to and from hotels in The Woodlands.

cards.title: Trusted Fleet
cards.description: We offer Houston a variety of Standard, Business, luxurious and Limousine vehicles to satisfy all of your ground transportation needs in safety and at affordable prices! Our Cars are from the safest makes and models manufactured by world leaders car manufacturers, Such as G.M, Ford, Mercedes Benz, Toyota and BMW. All our cars are permitted by the city of Houston and insured with one million dollar each car. Our Cars are well maintained at the dealership facility of each car maker.

cards.title: Luxury Fleet
cards.description: Each vehicle has the necessary amenities to make your transportation service safe, comfort and enjoyable. Our goal is to deliver a high quality transportation service to our clients with affordable rates. Please browse photos and information of the most requested cars of our selection of Standard, Business and luxury Sedan, SUVs VANs and Limousine vehicles to find the perfect one to accommodate your needs. Photos of VIPs Cars such as Mercedes Benz S class Rang Rover and Rolls Roys not included here, please call for information and quotes.

cards.title: Easy Booking
cards.description: You may use our on-line transfer service reservation form. For your convenience, we offer corporate accounts and accept all major credit cards. Please Book and pay online or call us at +1 346-857-4294 / 800-994-5078 to make your reservation for AAdmirals transportation service. We have discounted prices for new and current customers, even more our online booking and payment is already %5 less than phone calls reservations and all rates are less than our competitors.

BookARideBC.title: Where Comfort Meets Corporate Class
BookARideBC.description: Experience executive travel designed for performance, professionalism, and peace of mind.

cards.title: Diplomatic Etiquette
cards.alt: Business Men sitting in to taxi from his charted plane
cards.description: Our chauffeurs are trained in diplomatic etiquette, ensuring every ride meets international standards of decorum and discretion.

cards.title: Secure & Private Travel
cards.alt: Business Men sitting in to taxi from his charted plane
cards.description: We coordinate closely with embassy and defense teams to ensure safe, confidential, and seamless transport for dignitaries and officials.

cards.title: 24/7 Global Availability
cards.alt: Business Men sitting in to taxi from his charted plane
cards.description: From airport pickups to high-level meetings, we’re available around the clock to serve diplomats with professionalism and precision.

SecurityStandard.alt: Picture of a business woman sitting in the backseat of his car using his computer.
SecurityStandard.description: At AAdmirals, security is at the heart of everything we do. Our vehicles are equipped with the latest safety features, and our professional chauffeurs are trained to handle the unique needs of high-profile individuals. Whether you are traveling for business or diplomatic affairs, we ensure that every aspect of your journey is safe, secure, and fully compliant with all security protocols.

HighLevelTravel.alt: Picture of a business woman sitting in the backseat of his car using his computer.
HighLevelTravel.description: In addition to our secure transportation services, we offer a range of support options to make your travel experience effortless. From coordination with embassy security teams to multilingual chauffeurs, we handle all logistics to ensure that your trip is stress-free and aligned with your unique requirements. Our goal is to provide a service that allows you to focus on your priorities while we take care of the rest.

SeemlessJourney.alt: Picture of a business woman sitting in the backseat of his car using his computer.
SeemlessJourney.description: We pride ourselves on delivering a personalized, efficient, and stress-free experience. Our team is dedicated to making your travel plans as smooth as possible, from coordinating pickups to ensuring punctuality. With AAdmirals, you can relax knowing that every aspect of your journey is handled with care and professionalism.

BookARideDS.title: Where security and professionalism drive your journey.
BookARideDS.description: Experience travel that prioritizes safety and seamless professionalism, ensuring every ride meets the highest standards of security and protocol.

HeroSectionEP.Heading2: Book Reliable Rides for Unforgettable Events

cards.title: Sports Event Transfer
cards.alt: Business Men sitting in to taxi from his charted plane
cards.description: Seamless, reliable transport to and from sports events—skip the hassle of parking and traffic, and enjoy the game stress-free.

cards.title: Concert Transfer
cards.alt: Business Men sitting in to taxi from his charted plane
cards.description: Enjoy smooth, worry-free transport to and from your concert—arrive on time and in style without the stress of parking or traffic.

cards.title: Rodeo Transfer
cards.alt: Business Men sitting in to taxi from his charted plane
cards.description: Ride stress-free to and from the rodeo—safe, reliable transport that gets you there on time so you can enjoy the action without the hassle.
